metadata.name: 1) Ballsy Art Pattern #1/2
metadata.description:
Made by an introvert creating intricate circle patterns | Finding beauty in simplicity | Quietly observing the world |

Art is like a circle, it has no beginning and no end, and just like a circle, it symbolizes wholeness and unity, reminding us that there is always hope for a brighter future.

This is Lujan's very first mint of the Ballsy Art Pattern collection.

Every piece has a unique pattern for the observer to discover.  

There are two consistent patterns that were consciously made in this piece. 

The first one might be obvious while the second one requires having to look a little deeper. In other words, you may need to look beyond the shapes and colors.
